title: ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData.Staggered
description: Gets or sets whether to alternate the positioning of the weld beads on both sides of the weld body.
returns: True to alternate positioning of the weld beads, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::Side
=
swCosmeticWeldBeadSide_e
.swCosmeticWeldBeadSide_BothSides and
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::IntermittentWeld
is true.
